conversion_verification.notes: The 2D floor plan has been successfully transformed into a high-fidelity 3D isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent transformation; wall thickness and floor planes are clearly defined with accurate isometric geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout; room adjacencies and wall proportions match the source image almost perfectly.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement (beds, sofas, kitchen island) is remarkably consistent with the 2D plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting; the use of light from windows adds to the depth without obscuring detail.

detected_errors.description: Minor variations in door swing directions throughout the model.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect geometric and furniture layout fidelity from the 2D source.
